website_summaries.verdict: Rugged sandbags made from heavy-duty polypropylene material. UV protected for outdoor use.
pros: Can take a load of up to 50 lb
Made from a heavy-duty polypropylene material with thick weaves
Photodegradable UV protection means these bags will last up to 1,600 hours before degrading
cons: Some users find the provided bag tie inadequate for secure fastening

customer_reviews.title: Great for securing a trampoline
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use as anchors for our trampoline. The bags are very easy to fill and appear to be durable. They hold a lot of sand and the ties are long enough to wrap around to keep the sand from pouring out.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFourinFFX

customer_reviews.title: These are the best.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for sandbags that are tough, with sturdy ties that will hold up for years to the elements these are the ones you need. The water source for my goats is a pipe that comes out of a creek. I use these sandbags to create a small dam that backs the water up for a continual flow. The creek periodically floods and some of the sandbags will wash down several hundred feet. I simply walk down the creek, retrieve these bags and reuse them. I have never had one rupture.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Vilcinskas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These bags work great. I test sand for the company I work for and rather than discard the sand after the test is complete, I've been storing it in these bags to help weigh down tarps and other things prone to wind gusts. They are durable bags, easy to fill, and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Obropta

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags have lots of uses, now or 'just in case'.
customer_reviews.text: For fun, for prepping, for events or recreation by holding down tents or 'popup' covers, or just in case of flooding or the apocalyptic event, is easy with these space saving, easy to fill bags, fillable with sand, natural soil, deco mulch rock or damp mulch, should be a value and potential benefit everyone must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this product. Ordered 30 over 3 years ago & filled them with sand for future needs. Used them on two occasions since & they have held up well. Recently ordered more to add to my ready stock of filled bags in preparation of this year's hurricane season. The green color blends in well with the landscaping plants behind my garage so it isn't offensive to my neighbors. Just recommend storing out of direct sunlight as much as possible to extend the useful life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags as liners in heavy-duty canvas sand bags so that the canvas sand bags would last longer. I'm sure these would make good sand bags on their own, but I was wanting to use them to protect the canvas sand bags, and they worked great for that. I didn't have any problem with them tearing or getting holes. They look like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We needed sand bags to go around a vinyl shed to prevent wind and rain from getting and as well a stablizing the bottom. These were exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazshopper

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags for storms and shooting
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to military sandbags, they work well o block water during storms and as support during target practice at the range for both rifle and sidearms.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Did what I wanted. Well constructed and, so far, durable. The olive drab color brought back memories of the Army - some good, some not so good! A very reasonable price compared to what I priced elsewhere. In addition, the 15 pieces was all I needed and other offers were considerably more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used at endurance event
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for endurance event. Filled with sand, carried this thing for days, and didn’t bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mosel

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags in case of flooding at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered 50 more. Work great and the green color makes then easy to hide under mulch.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B Milikin

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these so that we can fill them with sand and put them in the umbrella base. They were very easy to use, made of quality material, and appear as though they will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Ron AZ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to build a fort with. They seem to work fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swasey

customer_reviews.title: Not what was described.
customer_reviews.text: Received sandbags within two days. However these are not the sandbags that were described. These were white and extremely flimsy. Maybe they will do the job. Hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have bought them. Works great to get rid of a large sand box I had in the back yard. THe bags are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to store chains that were laying around my basement. From past experience in the military I knew they are very strong. They are serving the purpose and I have leftover for any other needs. Trust me when I say you will find many uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Confer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandbags! My husband uses them at his job and they do the job! And they are so sturdy while also being cheap! And the shipping always arrives before the projected time! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Kring

customer_reviews.title: Strong and tough!
customer_reviews.text: I left these bags filled with sand under the outdoor deck for 4+ years and it's still in great condition. Bags I purchased from local nursery didn't even last 2 years against the extremely NJ winter.
customer_reviews.author: techie2012

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy to unload on sunny days and sturdy enough to last for several years
customer_reviews.text: Handy to put sand/gravel in to put in the back of the truck bed for slippery winter days. Not too heavy to unload on sunny days and sturdy enough to last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Sand does leak through sides and ties don't get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sand does leak through sides and ties don't get the job done well either. Some plastic bags for liners and bailing twine to tie it closed and your in business
customer_reviews.author: George E Knight Jr

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Very durable. 2nd time purchasing these bags. First we used them for preventing washouts in our yard. Now we're are using them to hold down a 24'x13' shelter. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Jaminite

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Though they haven't yet been tested for long-term durability, they seem strong enough, especially for the price. One of the strong selling points for these were their color...since they're in an area around plants, I didn't want the standard white bags. These blend in a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: They're sand bags, not sure how to review them. They hold sand well, i use them for weight in rucking
customer_reviews.author: Nathan DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Tough. Cheap. Works
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for filling with sand to hold down a large umbrella on deck
customer_reviews.author: Geezerglide

customer_reviews.title: sturdy little sandbags
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make some weights for my kids. They worked well for that.
customer_reviews.author: polymerman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and was as product description stated. Have not ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and was as product description stated. Have not used yet. Wanted them in case our street flooded again during heavy rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The products are good quality as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered sandbags to get prepared for flooding from hurricane florence. I wasn’t expecting them in time, but they arrived in time at no extra shipping cost. The bags were just what I needed and worked just fine. Thanks David morgan Elon, NC
customer_reviews.author: david morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags
customer_reviews.text: Just plain old simple and very durable sandbags. Am very pleased with this product and would certainly purchase another batch. Highly recommended to anyone in the market for a simple rugged sandbag.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Swain

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Army's.
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as the ones I used in the military. Had for a year and held up through the storms and everything. Great price, great sand bags.
customer_reviews.author: Matticus

customer_reviews.title: Sand bagging
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son bunker that he made . They arrived fast, and they look like sand bags. They were easy to fill and are holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh adams

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane prepared
customer_reviews.text: We'll be ready for the next hurricane- these bags are sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: zmama

customer_reviews.title: Basic Sand Bags, Work Well, Leak Slightly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to be used as a rifle rest and bipod loading bag for target shooting. The tie works well and they're durable. We throw them around a lot and they do leak a bit of sand. Double bagging would probably prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: The sandbags arrived quickly and are very well made. I only needed a few and it was nice that I could order a small amount at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sandbanks can't wait to use them for my next storm here in Florida
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of these bags. Sandbags get pretty dirty looking so the green color masks the dirt or soil that can cling to the bags. They are also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Martino

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Just like you fond in the home improvement stores, only cheaper. Easy to fill and tie off. I didn't need 15 though but at the price it was still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RailFan65

customer_reviews.title: Bag it
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my fertilizer storage. Perfect for the projects I need them for. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worked greaT. Perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.text: We used these bags in combination with a Kelty shelter and an Easy-up shelter at the beach this summer. They were excellent to weight the shelters down at the corners and keep them in place. They are sturdy and easy to store. Beach winds are unpredictable at times and the ability to add more weight without a hassle was a bonus. The kids also used them as a quick seat or pillow. Just fill it with sand, mold it and throw a towel over it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn J. Mccalla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Stopped the rain from going into my garage like I wanted. Good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: GARY L MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used the sandbags as a retainer wall on our driveway by the creek. They worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hodges

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: finally got to put them to use,i keep them in the backyard ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: surge2007

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this same product before and it hasn't disappointed me yet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this same product before and it hasn't disappointed me yet. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was extremely fast. the bags are well made and will suit me purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third order of these sandbags from these sellers. The sandbags are strong, durable and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.teacup

customer_reviews.title: Good for many different storage tasks
customer_reviews.text: These are larger than I thought. Good for many different storage tasks. Very lightweight and packable. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: congamike

customer_reviews.title: looks like a quality bag with a tight weave
customer_reviews.text: FAST delivery, looks like a quality bag with a tight weave. only time will tell how they hold up under use.
customer_reviews.author: mrbsox

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Strong and sturdy! Purchased to hold extra rocks from a project and these do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D

customer_reviews.title: More than just sandbags!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the product is described. Very durable! I didn't use them as sandbags, but used them to relocate some rocks when I moved. They worked perfectly, not one puncture, rip, or tear. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is better than most
customer_reviews.text: Same as mil-spec quality sandbags, and hold up to outdoor use at about the same rate. Price is better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Comanche6

customer_reviews.title: ... the same thing trust me you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are the same ones we used out in the field altho they look alittle bigger but still the same thing trust me you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for storing extra garden rocks. love the green color too
customer_reviews.author: volunteer

customer_reviews.title: excellent service and product
customer_reviews.text: excellent service and product, very good quality and strong to hold sand, perfect for what I was looking for thanks..
customer_reviews.author: Juan F. Muro

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: the laces are thin and hard to tie a good knot with. Other than that - good. Good size. They held for a winter filled with sand in my truck trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tough and inexpensive - can't ask for more if you want to load your own sandbags, though these days you can buy them ready-to-go at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, thank you. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Titan

customer_reviews.title: Not to be used around guns.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bags to keep shooting targets from blowing down. The lead breaks apart on contact and rips the bags. If used for any other application, I believe these will do.
customer_reviews.author: David Myers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: came in fast. really these are what you would expect. so on the bright side they are rather inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have filled all 15 of Them with sand awaiting El Ninio. Tied off Easily
customer_reviews.author: BobHasenstab

customer_reviews.title: its green, its a bag, and it holds stuff ...  yep, you got it.
customer_reviews.text: these bacgs are exactly what they say they are. I used them to fill with scrap material to create a dead-stop for shooting the bow. worked for what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: dhakimi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Bags. A little hard to tie but they are sturdy and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bernhard Hall

customer_reviews.title: good material
customer_reviews.text: We used to transport rocks and it was definitely strong
customer_reviews.author: drivera060

customer_reviews.title: This product is good to go
customer_reviews.text: Exactly th same type we had in the army. This product is good to go.
customer_reviews.author: William Bernath

customer_reviews.title: Hold sand well
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put sand in and weigh some things down, so that they wouldn't, fall over. They did the job real well!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good Sand Bags
customer_reviews.text: Though I have not had these bags for long, I am impressed with them so far. I filled them with play sand and used them to make a "temporary levee." This levee is just inside my garage door, where rain water occasionally intrudes ... especially when the wind is from one particular direction. These bags seem perfect for this application. They also seem surprisingly strong to me, with each holding about 25 pounds of sand very nicely. They would hold even more, but 25 pounds is all I need for my application. The seller had them delivered ahead of time; and I gladly will do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBum59

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had a "yard" of pea gravel on the street, after a big landscaping job. Faced with what to do with the rest, used these to bag the gravel and store it for future "repair" work on the yard. They were perfect, strong and didn't tear at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bott

customer_reviews.title: Works even for rocks
customer_reviews.text: Needed to bag up river rocks and these worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Booksbylj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made, though bigger than what I was wanting, but as described.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly John

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This are surprisingly very durable and leak sand minimally. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mongol Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like you think it would ... its a sandbag....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toss a few in your camping gear, car, etc, and fill them up when you need some extra weight to hold something down!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. These sandbags provided me with comfort in knowing that my canopy will not fly away even in gusty conditions. I tied four of these to each leg of the canopy and they held it down with ease. I also made a makeshift anchor to keep a couple of rafts in one spot when camping on the beach. These sandbags (unfilled obviously) will have a permanent home in my camping/outdoor gear. One thing to be careful of, though, is the material can fray easily if you are filling the bags with a serrated shovel, like the entrenching tool I was using. This can be avoided with a little finesse.
customer_reviews.author: badfish

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to help hold down a swing chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pagni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable compared to others I have purchased. wish they came in diffrent sizes
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M Boehrs

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a cheap and effective sandbag look no further! These sandbags have been used in my backyard to anchor multiple items for over a year. There still strong and have maintained there color much better than expected. If you've been in the service, there practically identical to the ones I used in my time. I've also filled 2 for workout purposes one 25 pounds and the other 30. I can easily recommend these bags for personal or business use.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sandbag
customer_reviews.text: these are good to have around to keep water out for storms and they hold up well great buy and not too much coin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I had in mind. Very strong, ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had in mind. Very strong, breathable bags to store some dirt in for a while. They came sooner than promised, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sutton

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 15 of these to weight down tarps at a baseball field. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Quit sandbaggin it!
customer_reviews.text: I just used these this past weekend to sight in my new rifle. These are high quality bags worth the money. The quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Abildgaard

customer_reviews.title: Sand bags
customer_reviews.text: Served the purpose for which I purchased. To move and handle landscape gravel. Will repurpose for future use in lawn work
customer_reviews.author: Don Cook

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bag that holds sand. It does that well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hasani

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags work great. I didn't have access to sand
customer_reviews.text: Sandbags work great. I didn't have access to sand. So I filled them with dry dirt. Its worked great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The sand bags work great! They serve their purpose well. They were exactly like the ones I used in the Marine corps
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Leyden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. I will be ordering more in the near future
customer_reviews.author: robert secott

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Used them to store the sand from the grand kids sand box this winter and then giving me double duty on the back of my pick up during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Great for home bunkers!
customer_reviews.text: The are just perfect for decorating my foyer. I am a Viet Nam Vet and love the feeling of nostalgia this gives the place. The only problem is getting clean sand at a reasonable price (dirt cheap.) And when these are filled, boy are they heavy. But they are just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr X

customer_reviews.title: Kind of expensive. Mine last about 18 months outdoors ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive. Mine last about 18 months outdoors in the sun/weather.
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Using to weigh down umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and was well packed. Thick material has held up well in the florida seaside salt and sun. We get stiff winds and these work well to add additional weight to umbrella stands. Green color blends pretty well with vegetation.
customer_reviews.author: Sft

customer_reviews.title: I bought some like this before
customer_reviews.text: I bought some like this before, but they must have been from a different vendor. Bags are good but the ties are terrible. Basically one strand of material that will tear if you pull to hard. Others I bought had a string similar to baling twine.
customer_reviews.author: William Evans

customer_reviews.title: They are so inexpensive that if they let a good couple of years you have gotten your money's worth
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable, but not very pricey either. They hold up well enough. If they deteriorate then you replace. They are so inexpensive that if they let a good couple of years you have gotten your money's worth. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: War Vice

customer_reviews.title: They hold sand. Satisfied for now.
customer_reviews.text: They work. They are sand bags, what else do you want. The ties are pretty effective but we will see as time goes on. Very inexpensive. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TheCatalystCorner

customer_reviews.title: Yah and Nay
customer_reviews.text: Works good but want last if you place them in direct sun light.
customer_reviews.author: jerry flanders

customer_reviews.title: Quality - Color - Value Pricing
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for: quality construction, olive drab color and economical price. Would recommend them (the vendor) to those needing a company that specializes specifically in sandbags.
customer_reviews.author: Camo Gleisberg

customer_reviews.title: Sand Bag
customer_reviews.text: How exactly do you evaluate a sand bag? It is definitely a bag. It will definitely hold sand. when loaded with sane it is heavy. Ok 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: No home should be without these!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish these came with a helper to fill them. Even better, if they came already filled with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described ; looks same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These bags feel substantial and durable but I have yet to fill them with sand and put to the test.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: sandbag
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery and made sturdy enough for the job. It came with no instructions so I just winged it and put sand in the opening on top and then tied it close. I think that will be good enough...I hope.
customer_reviews.author: jromewilly

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product! Went to Lowes and asked a attendant ...
customer_reviews.text: Used with play sand in a bag and inserted in Olive Drab Sandbag to help hold down a trampoline, have eight bags (400 pounds) holding down the trampoline. Just a great product! Went to Lowes and asked a attendant and he had no idea and I was there at the store and thought hey, Amazon, and sure nuff, Amazon Prime does it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Strong 2. Beautiful color 3. Perfect sand or soil bags Con: 1. The seller does not offer the options for a customer who would like to buy 50 bags or 100 bags at a time
